Education_content: Courses include Algorithm, Database System, Networking, Software Development, Computer system, and Front-end and Back-end Web development

children.description: Ability to program HTML, CSS, and JavaScript during website development
Skilled in using XML and Java on Mobile Application project development.
Familiar with analyzing data and coding projects through Python
Using the C code to deal with some single chip code
Building MySQL database, and processing data through it.
Using MySQL at back-end web development.
Familiar with using Git as well as using Git CI/CD tool to debug.
Familiar with Junit debugging tool, and PowerShell debug tools of multiple programming languages.
Familiar with using JUNIT debugging tool
Familiar with using Microsoft suites and Advanced functions, including using Macro.
Using the Premiere pro, Lighting room, Photoshop.
Able to use the Vue (Element-design, ant design) to design a dynamic web
Familiar with using axios method to exchange .Json package with back-end
Familiar with Linux(Ubuntu , deepin), and Windows PowerShell command

children.details: The use of Java.net to achieve the client and server communication, and the use of the basic multi-threading rules, up to 20 users at the same time to support access, at the same time the use of real-time thread monitoring for some of the user's special code mode switch, such as encryption communication and thread broadcast.
Design and test the robot to avoid obstacles automatically and find objects automatically by using sensors
Competition, and complete the analysis, implementation, and testing

Ongoing outside class project with three other peers, using Vue and ant-design to Help myself to build a personal Photo show web as well as self CV, In the blueprint I will have a background for uploading images
Implementation technology: front and rear end separation, Axios to communicate and My SQL as the database in Dal server, and .json with switch package.

Ongoing outside class project with three other peers, using Android develop Ide to develop a mobile app, which can help university students plan for future classes, and help them organize the weekly schedule

My main job is about the Team leader and UI and assistant with back-end which is about to do the Home page and giving student a Google map location to see the building, and achieve functions of this page, I am using XML to design UI, and using java to do back-end programing with several APIs. Also, I would be the tester of this project, I am currently using JUNIT to do.
